author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Tempus Global Business Service Group Holding to pay cash dividend of 0.47 yuan per 10 shares on May 11
text:
May 4 (Reuters) - Tempus Global Business Service Group Holding Ltd
* Says it will pay a cash dividend of 0.47 yuan per 10 shares (before tax) for 2017 to shareholders of record on May 10
* The companyâ€™s shares will be traded ex-right and ex-dividend on May 11 and the dividend will be paid on May 11
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/BPyLpk
